DOC.brief_summary: - Misoprostol reduces uterine bleed cesarean delivery without harmful effect either mother baby . - The aim study address benefit 'regarding intra-operative blood loss ' preoperative rectal administration 400 mic Misoprostol addition routinely administrate 10 unit oxytocin
DOC.brief_title: Could Pre-operative Rectal Misoprostol Reduce Intra-operative Blood Loss During Ceserean Section ?
DOC.detailed_description: Research question : In woman undergo elective ceserean section , preoperative 400 mic Misoprostol reduce intra-operative blood loss ? Research hypothesis : pre-operative Misoprostol n't reduce intraoperative blood loss woman undergo ceserean section
DOC.criteria: 3841 week amenorrhea schedule elective low segment cesarean section confirm intrauterine fetal death previous 2 ceserean section multiple pregnancy antepartum haemorrhage selfreported maternal heart disease current diagnosis severe malaria acute bacterial infection
